EmailTemplate.name: 2016-NavDB-EmailBlast-EMEAI.2016-NavDB-EmailBlast-EMEAI Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t let a floppy disk cause you an AOG!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> DON'T LET A FLOOPY DISK CAUSE YOU AN AOG!
As of December 31st, 2016 Honeywell’s Navigation Database Updates will no longer be available in Floppy Disk format. Please Note: The navigation data provided for USB will not load if transferred to floppy disk for upload. If you haven’t upgraded yet, we urgently recommend you update to the Honeywell DL-950 or DL-1000 data loaders – both of which are designed as a form-fit replacement to the old DL-900 and use the existing aircraft connector. Installation of this new unit is quick and easy. To find out more please click here <[[http://hwll.co/efxh]]>.
To request a sales representative to call you, please complete the SALES FORM <[[http://hwll.co/efxh]]> alternatively check with your local dealer on how to upgrade and keep your aircraft in the air. DOWNLOAD FLYER <[[http://hwll.co/nkv5]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://honeywell.com/privacy/pages/en.aspx]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
